src:
Radio Slovenija: Pri Zidanem Mostu se je iztiril vlak

06 Nov 2019, 07:07


Zidani Most, 6. novembra - Pri Zidanem Mostu se je iztiril vlak, je poročal Radio Slovenija. Poškodovan ni nihče, gmotna škoda bo po prvih ocenah velika. Okoliščine in vzrok nesreče še preiskujejo. Po informacijah STA je iztiril tovorni vlak, do nesreče pa je prišlo okoli 1.30. To je sicer že tretja nesreča v zadnjih treh mesecih na tem območju.



Dobrepolje. Železniški tiri.Foto: Tamino Petelinšek/STA Arhiv STA

Sredi avgusta sta namreč na železniški progi Celje-Zidani Most na postaji Rimske toplice iztirila lokomotiva in vagon tovornega vlaka.
Prav tako sta na istem mestu v začetku avgusta iztirila madžarska vagona mednarodnega potniškega vlaka, še ena nesreča pa je bila na tej postaji leta 2012.
text:
Radio Slovenija: A train derailed at Zidani Most

06 Nov 2019, 07:07


Zidani Most, November 6 - A train derailed at Zidani Most, Radio Slovenia reported. No one is injured, and the material damage will be huge according to first estimates. The circumstances and cause of the accident are still under investigation. According to the STA, the freight train was derailed and the accident occurred around 1.30. This is the third accident in the area in the last three months.



Dobrepolje. Rail tracks.Photo: Tamino Petelinsek / STA STA Archive

In mid-August, a locomotive and a freight wagon were wiped out on the Celje-Zidani Most railway line at the Roman Toplice station.
They also wiped out an international passenger train wagon at the same site in early August, and another accident occurred at that station in 2012.
